name: Pandamonium (Maytch)
description:
Pandamonium - a 3D Adventure Platformer made for Ludum Dare 45 Game Jam. You start with nothing, but gain powers as you explore the world!

Controls:

  • Mouse - Look
  • Left Mouse Button - Use Power
  • 1 - 4 - Select Powers
  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • H - Help Screen
  • M - Mute Music

Collect all 6 Trophies to Win!

As a bonus challenge - collect all 200 Acorns!

Powers:

  • 1 - Tornado spin attack
  • 2 - Dash attack
  • 3 - Double jump
  • 4 - Glide
